infos.value: I have briefly summarized my explanations. If you could check them, it would be most appreciated.
Through contributing to your guild, you can procure various spoils of war. By all means, please join in and give it a try.

• Guild Quests •
Guild Quests can be challenged by constructing the Knight Stone Statue.

• Knight Stone Statue •
Guild Statue EXP can be acquired when Guild Quests are cleared by Guild Members.
Various effects will be applied to all members when the Lv. of the statue increases.

• Attempt Reset •
The number of Quest attempts is limited.
Attempts are reset daily at 00:00, World Time (PST).

• Unlocked Effects •
Presently applied Guild Statue effects can be confirmed.
Proceed to a tutorial on Guilds?
